hasFinishLineBeenCrossed(int) - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Verification if the pair Horse/Jockey horse has crossed the finish line.

haveIWon(int) - Method in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Verification if a given Spectator identified with spectatorId has won his (or hers) bet.
haveIWon(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.BettingCentreInterface
 
hippodrome - package hippodrome
Provides the classes necessary to create an environment needed to complete a horse race scenario.
hippodrome.actions - package hippodrome.actions
Provides the extra classes necessary to create actions of a horse race scenario.
hippodrome.responses - package hippodrome.responses
Provides the classes necessary to answer and represent any response from a entity state change, in order to well update the current state of a given thread's execution.
hippodrome.rollfilm - package hippodrome.rollfilm
Provides the classes which saves a snapshot of both entities at stake and the race.
honourTheBets() - Method in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Changes the state of the Entities to Settling Accounts (SA) and waits till the last BettingCentre.goCollectTheGains(int) is done by a Spectator.
honourTheBets() - Method in interface hippodrome.BettingCentreInterface
